members.name: Mitchell Reed
members.bio: Mitchell Reed leads the Hickory High School Band Program with passion and dedication. Graduate of Virginia Commonwealth University with a Bachelor's in Music Education. Former middle school band director with 8 years of experience. Specializes in marching band design and concert band literature.
highlights: 8 years of middle school band experience

members.name: Yvonne Daye
members.bio: Yvonne Daye brings exceptional expertise to the Hickory High School Band Program. Graduate of Norfolk State University with a Master's in Music Education. Former professional musician with symphony orchestra experience. Specializes in woodwind instruction and jazz ensemble direction.
highlights: Master's degree from Norfolk State University

members.name: Derek Johnson
members.bio: Derek Johnson supports the band program with expertise in brass instruction and percussion techniques. Graduate of James Madison University with a Bachelor's in Music Performance. Former drum corps instructor with DCI experience. Specializes in marching percussion and brass pedagogy.

members.name: Aubrey Horstman
members.bio: Aubrey Horstman contributes to the success of the Hickory High School Band Program through dedicated instruction and mentorship. Graduate of Old Dominion University with a Bachelor's in Music Education. Former color guard performer and instructor. Specializes in visual design and student leadership development.
